biotools.summary:
Non-parametric modelling of temporal and spatial counts data from RNA-seq experiments.

GPcounts is Gaussian process regression package for counts data with negative binomial and zero-inflated negative binomial likelihoods described in the paper "Non-parametric modelling of temporal and spatial counts data from RNA-seq experiments". It is implemented using the GPflow library.

bioschemas.name: GPcounts
